const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "example",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      geometry: {
        type: "shape",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "example",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "wait_for",
  document: {
    name: "Lucky Landing",
    geometry: {
      type: "point",
      coordinates: [1355.400544, 5255.530286],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
